Mailing Address: c/o Kelowna & District Genealogical SocietyPO Box 21105Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9N8
Service Details: Provides members with four issues of its newsletter, free queries, use of the materials in its library, research nights for sharing and learning, and general meetings with interesting genealogical topics
Cost: Membership - $30 per Annum for individuals and $35 for a family membership ; - For queries, a $20.00 fee is required to cover postage, photocopying and other expenses, with any surplus donated to the Society Library- Membership runs from Sep-Jun
Meetings: See the calendar of events for more information: http://www.kdgs.ca/p/calendar-of-events.html
Print Material: Okanagan Researcher Newsletter is published 4 times per year
